name: tmber
description: an online version of timber game card

scripts.watch: rm -Rf dist && concurrently -p "name" -n "server,client" -c "red,blue" "npm run watch:server" "npm run watch:client"
scripts.watch:client:only: rm -Rf dist && concurrently -p "name" -n "server,client" -c "red,blue" "npm run start" "npm run watch:client"
scripts.start-legacy: if [$NODE_ENV == 'production']; then node server/main.js; else nodemon --inspect server/main.js --watch "./dist" --watch "./server"; fi
